entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Flaky test `Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.KeyManagement.KeyRingProviderTests.MultipleThreadsForceRefresh` #55227
  • Blazor @onclick not working #55225
  • Blazor WASM App navigation won't stop image request when image is a stream (webcam) #55219
  • ANCM: Randomly fails to load with White ANCM Error Page due to Directory Iteration on Startup #55216
  • Perf regression: endpoint, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #55215
  • Perf improvement: plainTextSansFilter #55214
  • Refresh token during http request in Blazor Interactive Server with OIDC #55213

Closed

  • API Proposal: AllowInteractiveRoutingAttribute for Blazor #55204
    9.0-preview4
  • Blazor routing fails when a query string is present #55187
  • Blazor Server - Deploy to IIS doesn't load wwwroot StaticFiles (404 not found) #55195
  • Performance of an Api that mocks any Api #55223
  • Overridden TryParseValueFromString does not appear to be used #55197
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #55206
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #55192
  • Perf regression: https #55205

PullRequests

Created

  • Sleep in MultipleThreadsForceRefresh #55231
    area-dataprotection
  • [release/8.0] Handle rejected promises inside incoming Invocation messages #55230
    Servicing-consider, area-signalr, 8.0.x
  • Revert "Remove __non_webpack_require__ workaround and split Node dependencies correctly (#48154)" #55229
    area-signalr, 8.0.x
  • Retry `Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.KeyManagement.KeyRingProviderTests.MultipleThreadsForceRefresh` #55228
    area-infrastructure
  • FlyBy typo fix in FeatureCollectionExtensions.cs #55217
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Fix duplicate error.type tags #55211
    area-hosting

Merged

  • Add readme for package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer #54492
    community-contribution, area-security, 9.0-preview4
  • Using SearchValues in ContentDispositionHeaderValue #55039
    Perf, community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview4
  • Implement minimal implementation of HybridCache #55147
    area-networking, 9.0-preview4
  • Allow retries in DefaultKeyResolver.CanCreateAuthenticatedEncryptor #54711
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview4
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `b1a777f` to `5a37b51` #55221
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Ensuring deleted cookies are recognized by the browser by ensuring the MaxAge within CookieOptions is set to null. #55169
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview4
  • [Blazor] Use JSON source generator during WebAssembly startup #54956
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview4
  • Per-page opt out from interactive routing #55157
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview4
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.4.24218.26 #55218
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • Add support for generating JSON schemas in OpenAPI doc #55208
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Change how ANCM recycles app #52807
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Don't output secret value from user-secrets set #55209
    area-commandlinetools
  • Condition RIDs on which target RIDs are available when doing a VMR build #55172
    area-infrastructure
